Direct Known Subclasses:
SingleFileFetcher
public class SimpleSingleFileFetcher
extends BaseSingleFileFetcher
implements ClientGetState

Fetch a single block file. Used by SplitFileFetcherSegment.

 void cancel(com.db4o.ObjectContainer container, ClientContext context)
          Cancel the request, and call onFailure() on the callback in order to tell downstream (ultimately the client) that cancel has succeeded, and to allow it to call removeFrom() to avoid a database leak.

removeFrom

public void removeFrom(com.db4o.ObjectContainer container,
                       ClientContext context)
Description copied from interface: ClientGetState
Once the callback has finished with this fetch, it will call removeFrom() to instruct the fetch to remove itself and all its subsidiary objects from the database. WARNING: It is possible that the caller will get deactivated! Be careful...

Specified by:
removeFrom in interface ClientGetState
Specified by:
removeFrom in interface RandomGrabArrayItem
Overrides:

cancel

public void cancel(com.db4o.ObjectContainer container,
                   ClientContext context)
Description copied from interface: ClientGetState
Cancel the request, and call onFailure() on the callback in order to tell downstream (ultimately the client) that cancel has succeeded, and to allow it to call removeFrom() to avoid a database leak.

Specified by:
cancel in interface ClientGetState
Overrides:
cancel in class BaseSingleFileFetcher
